item.title: Sailor add a quote by Stephenie Meyer
item.description: "He's like a drug for you, Bella." -- Stephenie Meyer

item.title: Sailor add a quote by John Steinbeck
item.description: "Try to understand men. If you understand each other you will be kind to each other. Knowing a man well never leads to hate and almost always leads to love." -- John Steinbeck

item.title: Sailor add a quote by Cornelia Funke
item.description: "Stories never really end...even if the books like to pretend they do. Stories always go on. They don't end on the last page, any more than they begin on the first page." -- Cornelia Funke

item.title: Sailor add a quote by Cornelia Funke
item.description: "Books have to be heavy because the whole world's inside them." -- Cornelia Funke

item.title: Sailor add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "It is our choices, Harry, that show what we truly are, far more than our abilities." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Sailor add a quote by John Steinbeck
item.description: "You've seen the sun flatten and take strange shapes just before it sinks in the ocean. Do you have to tell yourself every time that it's an illusion caused by atmospheric dust and light distorted by the sea, or do you simply enjoy the beauty of it?" -- John Steinbeck

item.title: Sailor add a quote by John Steinbeck
item.description: "Ideas are like rabbits. You get a couple and learn how to handle them, and pretty soon you have a dozen." -- John Steinbeck
